summary: Adds a Game of Thrones 'Ygritte' follower to the world of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
I found myself at the end of season 4 of Game of Thrones, "SPOILERS ALERT"



Missing Ygritte and her "Northern England" accent, so I decided to make her as a follower to come on my adventures all around skyrim. At the moment, only basic textures and armors have been implemented and no voice acting etc. either.

She can be found in the Sleeping Giant (River Woods Inn/Tavern)
She is Essential
Skilled in archery, sneak, light armor and one handed

THIS DOES REQUIRE DRAGONBORN

If I get any requests to make a non-dragonborn version I might.
Please endorse if you feel it needs improvement.
Thanks
author: Jebuz
